title: Microsoft Stream: Variable playback speed support (0.5 - 2x) for all video on OneDrive & SharePoint
description:
This feature allows users to control the playback speed of videos stored OneDrive & SharePoint. Users will be able to slow down or speed up the playback (0.5x -2x) while watching the video. Note: Teams meeting recordings already have this functionality, we are now adding it to all other videos stored in OneDrive and SharePoint.
GA date: February CY2023
